items.sentence: Have you ever heard Tom and Mary sing together?
Have you ever heard someone speaking in French?
Have you ever taken your children to the beach?
Tom doesn\'t know anything about this, does he?
Tom doesn\'t like the way Mary makes spaghetti.
Tom doesn\'t remember anything from that night.
You don\'t look like you\'re having a good day.
I didn\'t know that wasn\'t supposed to happen.
I didn\'t know we weren\'t supposed to do that.
I don\'t know if that\'s what Tom wants or not.
